item.description:
*Karen, who is a member of Boston Nightlife, is organizing an event for this Saturday*

KM Events invites you to a great way to start 2006!

Join us for our January Art Exhibit this Saturday 1/7 at 6-8pm
Check out Melanie's diverse & fabulous art and enjoy music by Boston's
talented musicians (this is not a live performance).

Cash Bar and full menu available

The admission is $5, but for meetup members it's FREE!:

You MUST mention to the Guest List/Cashier that you are a Meetup member so you will get in for free!!

IN Q is located on 279 A Newbury Street (5 min walk from Hynes
Convention Ctr. T stop)

Feel free to contact me with any questions 617-515-9240

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Art Exhibit on Saturday, Jan. 7 6-8pm @ IN Q
